attributes.action: Close all U.K. boarder to illegal immigrants  during the Coronavirus Pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Going forward most illegal migrants get he through a network of people traffickers. These traffickers are organised criminal gangs and terrorists who are making money out of Human misery to carry out other crimes. These traffickers need to be stopped from their illegal activity on Human Rights Laws and Slavery Laws to bring a end to this Human Trafficking problem.
attributes.background: Illegal immigration to the U.K. should stop immediately during this pandemic before a second wave hits. Only legal immigration should be permitted due to the health implications to U.K. citizens and especially the most vulnerable in our society.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Illegal immigration is already illegal.

You might want to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334089
